pages.text: The $(mob)Blue Slime$() is a monster found in $(thing)Slime Islands$(). It moves by making sucessive jumps and deals damage on contact.$(p)Like $(l:minecraft_slime)$(mob)Slimes$(), it comes in different sizes and will split up into several smaller $(mob)Blue Slimes$() on death.

The smallest $(mob)Blue Slimes$() drop blue $(item)Slime Balls$() on death. These can be eaten to gain $(thing)Slowness$() and $(thing)Jump Boost$() for a few seconds, dried into blue $(item)Gelatinous Slime Drops$(), or made into $(item)Blue Slime Crystals$() to make durable tool parts.$(p)They can also be used in any recipe that uses green $(l:minecraft_slime)$(mob)Slimeballs$().
